cause.description:
Educate young people with a curriculum of scientifically-based environmental knowledge; Encourage them to take actions which will help advance the mission; and Ensure that these actions/activities can be repeated and expanded as participants grow in knowledge and capacity.
Visit our web site at www.erthnxt.org
1. Each individual can make a difference one step at a time
2. Kids can make the earth a better place for future generations
3. Small steps can make a big difference
cause.mission: Educate Kids to Protect the Environment
cause.name: Trees for the 21st Century
